sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

Consider the figure given below. In this figure we have \(JK \parallel IN \), and \(JL \parallel IO \). Now, prove that \(KL \parallel NO \).
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
$$\text{In the triangle MNI , we have $JK \parallel IN $. So, we can write that}$$
\[
	\frac{K\input[s1v1]{} }{KN } = \frac{MJ }{\input[s1v2]{}I }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
$$\text{Now, again in triangle MOI , we have $JL \parallel IO $. So, we can write}$$
\[
	\frac{MJ }{JI } = \frac{M\input[s2v1]{} }{\input[s2v2]{}O }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
From the above two equations, we get
\[
	\frac{\input[s3v1]{}K }{KN } = \frac{\input[s3v2]{}L }{LO }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Thus, in the triangle MNO we can write 
\[
	\frac{MK }{\input[s4v1]{}\input[s4v2]{}} = \frac{ML }{LO }
\]

"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\textWhich means $KL \parallel NO $. Hence proved.}$$
\newline
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["M", "J"], "text": "$$\text{In the triangle MNI , we have $JK \parallel IN $, therefore, from the basic proportionality theorem $\frac{MK }{KN } = \frac{MJ }{JI }$.}$$"}, {"data": ["L", "L"], "text": "$$\text{In the triangle MOI , we have $JL \parallel IO $, therefore, again using the basic proportionality theorem $\frac{MJ }{JI } = \frac{ML }{LO }$.}$$ "}, {"data": ["M", "M"], "text": "$$\text{Using property, if $a = b$, and $a = c$, then $b = c$, therefore, from the above results we can write $\frac{MK }{KN } = \frac{ML }{LO }$}$$"}, {"data": ["K", "N"], "text": "$$\text{Using converse of Thale's Theorem we can say that in the triangle $MNO$, if $\frac{MK }{KN } = \frac{ML }{LO }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
